text: The men's 10,000 metres walk event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 16 September. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Jefferson Pérez ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Jacek Müller ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Grzegorz Müller ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 16 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
